md:
giải nghĩa từ "loved" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Loved (verb) - được yêu thích
	* Meaning: to be loved by someone or to love someone deeply.
	* Example: "She loved him with all her heart."
	* Related words: love, loving, beloved

2. Loved (adjective) - được yêu thích
	* Meaning: deeply loved or cherished.
	* Example: "He was a loved member of the community."
	* Related words: love, loving, beloved

3. Loved (past tense of love) - đã yêu
	* Meaning: to have loved someone or something in the past.
	* Example: "I loved playing with my friends when I was a child."
	* Related words: love, loving, beloved
html:
giải nghĩa từ "loved" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Loved (verb) - được yêu thích

    • Meaning: to be loved by someone or to love someone deeply.
    • Example: "She loved him with all her heart."
    • Related words: love, loving, beloved

  2. Loved (adjective) - được yêu thích

    • Meaning: deeply loved or cherished.
    • Example: "He was a loved member of the community."
    • Related words: love, loving, beloved

  3. Loved (past tense of love) - đã yêu

    • Meaning: to have loved someone or something in the past.
    • Example: "I loved playing with my friends when I was a child."
    • Related words: love, loving, beloved
